data.title: The Last Kingdom season 3 cast: Who is playing Bloodhair? Who is Ola Rapace?
data.meta_description: THE LAST KINGDOM season 3 will be hitting Netflix soon as the Bernard Cornwell historical drama series returns. But who will be playing the role of new character Bloodhair?
data.text:
Alexander Dreymon confirms series three of The Last Kingdom

Netflix hasn’t yet announced a release date for The Last Kingdom season three but it’s expected to be out later this year.

The new series will see King Alfred (played by David Dawson) trying to ensure his legacy and unite the kingdoms of England.

However, his ambitions will be jeopardised by incessant Danish attacks and he will call on Uhtred of Bebbanburg (Alexander Dreymon) to help him.

But the pair will have a fraught relationship which will be pushed to breaking point and make Uhtred reconsider his friendship with the king once and for all.

Season three of The Last Kingdom will be taking its cue from Cornwell’s fifth and sixth instalments of The Saxon Stories.

There will be 10 episodes in season three and it’s highly likely that the first half of the run will deal with the events in the fifth book titled The Burning Land.

The Burning Land will see the introduction of a character called Jarl Harald Bloodhair, who will serve as a major antagonist in season three.

Uhtred will be at odds with Bloodhair through most of the season with the tables constantly turning.

WHEN WILL THE LAST KINGDOM SEASON 3 BE ON NETFLIX?

Invalid email

We use your sign-up to provide content in ways you've consented to and to improve our understanding of you. This may include adverts from us and 3rd parties based on our understanding. You can unsubscribe at any time. Read our Privacy Policy

Fans of The Last Kingdom will see how Uhtred and Bloodhair will battle each other with the former fighting on behalf of his friend King Alfred but at times questioning his allegiances.

Not only can we expect to see battles but the stakes will be raised as the pair fight.

Along with Rapace, Timothy Innes will be joining as Edward, Tygo Gernandt as Jackdaw and Thea Sofie Loch Naess as Skade.

We can also some cast members returning including Eliza Butterworth, David Dawson, Toby Regbo, Emily Cox, Tobias Santelmann and Millie Brady.

HOW TO WATCH THE LAST KINGDOM SEASON 3 ONLINE

Who is playing Bloodhair in The Last Kingdom season 3?

Taking on the role of the Danish warrior Bloodhair in The Last Kingdom season three will be Ola Rapace.

Rapace is a 46-year-old Swedish actor, who was born in Tyresö, Stockholms län.

He was previously married to The Girl With The Dragon Tattoo actress Noomi Rapace with the pair getting hitched in 2001.

The couple decided to both use the surname Rapace with Ola changing his last name from Norrell.

They have one son together called Lev, who was born in 2003.

HOW MANY EPISODES ARE IN THE LAST KINGDOM SEASON 3?

Sadly, the couple ended up getting divorced in 2011.

Rapace is best known for his roles in detective TV series Wallander and Tusenbröder.

He had a small part in the James Bond film Skyfall in 2012 and Rancid.

The star’s other roles include Ares, Valerian and the City of a Thousand Planets, and I am Yours.

Along with being an actor, Rapace is also a producer with credits including TV show Hassel.

The Last Kingdom season 3 will be released on Netflix later this year
